attributes.review:
So i 🙋‍♀️decided to download this app👇 because of how much love 🥰i have in my heart ❤️ for our orange🍊 god 🙏‼️and how much of a great🤩 man 👨 he is😝 but the app took 28 DAYS AND NIGHTS 🌝🌚 to download👇 and whilst it downloaded 👇i kept getting the urge to yell racist and sexist things that woman and people of color including my boss‼️and i couldn’t 😾 even use my phone 📱 AT ALL🖕during the download but i figured that’s fine☺️ because me, a good old 👵  productive southern 🇺🇸 lady 👱‍♀️used the time to play 🤪with my 87 guns and shoot 🔫 21 innocent black people‼️ when the app finally downloaded 👇it started to play loud music 🎶 that caused 46 lamas 🦙to come into my home 🏡 and they started to poop everywhere🙌they also had terrible 😾manners like not 🖕taking there shoes 👞 off at the door 🚪 and one even started to cook 👩‍🍳 dinner 🥘 but since he is a lama 🦙he didn’t🤔 know how to use a stove, it caught fire 🔥 and before i knew it 😧 my whole house 🏠 was up in flames 🔥 when i finally got out 🏃‍♀️ of my house i opened the app to see 👁👄👁 if it would stop playing the loud ‼️ music 🎵 and it did😌 but on the screen 📱 popped up ☝️trumps bright orange 🍊 fluorescent penis🍆 i was i’m so much shock😳 i continued 👉to use the app 😔 and i saw a button that said “PRESS HERE” so i did and our orange 🍊 god was at my house‼️ (or ashes of a house now) and he told me to “get back in the kitchen dishwasher” and then he left!! 

(also all the lamas burned to death in the house fire and i lost my job and am now homeless)
attributes.title: VERY WOW pls read 🍊✨‼️🙀

attributes.review: This app is so slow I kept trying to load in and it kept just sending me right back out then after shutting my phone down REPEATEDLY📢🔴 it worked, I thought great finally but after trying to enter my number it wasn’t sending the verification code so I re sent and re sent and finally got it and after about a week of hanging out I was DONE!!! It was spamming my phone constantly!! 🟥U for the app to stay updated on the economy but that OSs not what I got oh and then when I tried to delete it, it wouldn’t let me!!!!!!!!?? 💬❌The app is still on my phone I have tried everything and it won’t stop so I blocked the number but that’s all I can do but today I’ve had suspicious activity like my Apple ID was acting up and I think this might all have to do with this app some one help
attributes.title: ❌All around bad app❌

And when I tried deleting it made my phone glitch and so now every time I restart my phone I see the mans face. -38295739939224/10 would not recommend
